group which believes in Goddess Kali.  As it was a festival day they  
had to offer a hen to the Goddess so they cut the head off a hen  
right in front of my eyes.  I felt disgusted and evenb gave up  
eating meat after this incident.
Deceived by other people and ran into trouble.
Joy at meeting a woman I love very much.
Yesterday my friend gave me a gift and had dinner with me.

I thought I would be able to use the mangle of the house, and so  
I did not want any help.  However, I blocked it and I had to get  
the janitor to help me out.  He reproached me for not having  
followed the instructions

After watching the 49ers lose game after game, year after year, I  
was finally rewarded with a Super Bowl victory which made me  
extremely happy.

On my birthday, my closest friends were here at Berkeley pithched  
in a lot of money each and bought me ten records to replace some  
of my records that were stolen. They threw a small surprise party  
for me too.

Sometime back I was coming from the wards and lice were all over  
my uniform since patient's blankets have a lot of lice. It  
happened that my boyfriend picked some lice from my white uniform.  
I was so ashamed.
Finding out that I can go to your English lectures.

My friend and I planned to search for old documents and utensils  
in the cellar. It was very late at night when we arrived in the  
cellar. He indicated the place where the police (40 years ago) found  
two dead bodies. I got very scared when he told me this story.

When I finished my C.S. Project I was overjoyed. I felt relieved  
because it was due the next day and I was tired of looking at it.

When I said good-bye to my girlfriend.  I had spent two years on  
developing this relationship and it was unsuccessful, I felt very  
sad.

I had a habit of wetting my bed when I was young.  One day, when  
I was invited to my friend's place to stay for the night, it  
happened again.  I was ashamed of myself.
After the loss of a close relative.

I blew up at someone for being confused and because of his  
irresponsibility and afterwards I felt guilty and that I had no  
right.

When I see all the putridness of people. The fact is the catarrh  
and spits that whash the streets of S.Paulo.

Recently, my sister-in-law's horse was poisoned by a plant and  
died. The horse was very obedient and exceptional with children.

When my brothers were being cruel to my boyfriend, because his  
flat-mate bent back one of my brother's fingers. It wasn't his  
fault.
My roommate boasting about her English lectures.

Once, I accidentally injured a boy in the eye and he almost lost  
it.
If a close relative's life is in danger.

When I saw a man hitting a child of 2 years without any consideration,  
simply because the child had been leaning against a window.

My grandmother has been in a hospital for a week and I still  
haven't had time to see her.

When my brother was born, everything went all right.  It had been  
very likely that he would have a deficiency (my sister suffers  
from Down's Syndrome) and that my mother would be in danger.

I felt very sad when I saw the first list from the names of the  
people who entered at the University and my name wasn't there.

During carnaval I danced for a few minutes normally I don't dance  
because I am rigid in my moving around during a dance, I stopped  
very soon.

I found myself involved in a fight in which a person died and I  
had to intervene with some risk.

When I left my sister's house after staying there for a few days.  
She has two little boys, and they are very warm people (the  
family). At the time, I was in need of this sort of contact, and  
I grew very fond of children (no, I'm not a paedophiliac).

In August,1983, the long awaited "big envelope" (a document for  
C.U.H.K admission) arrived.  It was in the afternoon and I had  
not been doing anything.  When the postman, with his big bag,  
knocked on the door I knew what it was about.  I hurriedly  
opened the envelope and my mood at that time is hard to describe.  
 It lasted several hours and only calmed down later.

Right now I volunteer at a hospital. Yesterday, Halloween, I  
dressed up as a doctor and went to work. The volunteer  
coordinator told me after my shift that it was dangerous to have  
done what I did.
Can think of no time that I have felt fear.

Once while studying for my exam I found so many complicated words  
that it disgusted me.

The day my boyfriend saw and touched my breasts when I was  
without my shirt, only with my pants.

My friend had been telling me about a certain bird which when it  
cries at night it's the sign that someone will die. So one night I  
was alone in the house and I heard the cry of the bird and I was  
afraid.

Meddlesomeness of my mother about the way I live. She thinks I am  
to free in my behavior for instance when a boyfriend stays the  
night.

When I received a letter from my girlfriend telling me that she  
was engaged to an another man.
I felt this when I was copying homework for one of my classes.

I went to the ballet lessons with a little friend in the dark. On  
a very quiet place a boy approached us from behind and asked at  
what time the lesson would be finished. I gave him an avoiding  
answer, he took me up and wanted to run away with me.
When I entered University.
I forgot about a close relatives's birthday.

When I dream of anything terrifying I used to have fear for the  
rest of the day that the dream might come true e.g., being beaten  
(or eaten ?) by a snake.

Sometimes when I go to work my crazy boss (a hyper Jewish lawyer)  
insists I do things his way (filing, typing, etc.). He sometimes  
blames me for things I didn't do, and I can't yell back at him.
Failing an examn because I did not work hard enough.

My father had once again told me that I should be careful and try to  
seek admission to other places also apart from the faculty of  
Social Sciences at the university of Helsinki.  I was not at all  
interested in any other place and had no time to study for other  
entrance exams.

My elder brother and I have not always had a good relationship  
and I feel ashamed of myself as I do not call him to talk to him  
nowadays.

When I got caught in the pouring rain last Thursday and did not  
have a raincoat on me.
I was angry this morning when I missed the train to university.
When I was selected to come here.

I feared that I was pregnant.  It was not planned and I would  
have been compelled to have an abortion, which I would not have  
liked at all.  Fortunately, after a week's anxiety, I got to know  
that I was not pregnant.

I felt ashamed to be Brazilian and to live under a military  
dictatorship that despoiled the people, when during my military  
service.

My father had a complicated operation. A long time before and  
also a long time after that, we did not know how he would get  
over it. During all that time I felt very sad.
When my sister left home to go and live with her husband.
Once when I said bad things concerning a friend.
Failing in an examn because of lazyness.

When we could not land our plane and we knew that the fuel was  
running out.  Bad weather had already frightened us.

I had been away from home for a long time and when I came home I  
was delighted.  It was wonderful to see familiar, dear people and  
I was rejoycing in advance.  I had been feeling very lonely.
When I had been angry at my friend without any reason.
The loss of a very good friend.

I live outside Graz - so I have to go by bus. One day I went home  
from the bus stop alone. It was dark, I had to go through a  
forest and there was a dark figure behind me. I was very  
frightened.
Betraying someone's trust.
When I insulted an elderly person for no reason.

I was on a class excursion, by boat to Stockholm.  At night my  
class mates prepared to clebrate their motive in life which was  
"life is merriment".  I felt depressed about the way they sought  
happiness.

It was the first time that I gave a birthday present to my friend.  
  She wrote me a letter as she is my girlfriend.  The content of  
the letter was so sweet that it made me feel very happy.
Often I forget to give my immediate family birthday presents.
Before my final examination.
Heard some ghost-like noise at night.
China winning the Asian Olympic.
When I learnt of the death of a friend.

I received the results of the test paper of my major subject and  
I found that my result was not as good as a classmate who had  
recently changed his major subject.    I felt very ashamed.

My elder sister forced me to do a few things which I did not like  
to do.
When I was walking along a road alone on my way to go shopping.
Had to tell people that my parents are divorced.
When my boyfriend wanted to leave me, I felt sad and melancholic.

When at times unconscienciously I speak to my mother in a high  
tome but after that I am sorry and I feel guilty.

I was talking badly about a person to some friends, and  
discovered that his daughter was listening.

I hate hypocrisy. My friend (girl) tried to intrude into my  
affairs with my future husband. After that she behaved as if  
nothing had happened.

I received a letter and a Christmas present from a person I had  
not seen for two years.

When there was a fight at home and my father threatened to throw  
a chair on my brother.
Not accepting hints of intimate relation from a girl.

My class leader told me the university won't let all of us go to  
your lectures because we are not All English Class.

I went to the dining hall and found that the cooks were cleaning  
the plates and there was no food for me, and the blue birds   
(security guards) were busy eating the food that was supposed to  
be for me.
When, as an adult I have been caught lying or behaving badly.
My roommate being unconsiderate.

My best friend had a relatively severe illness.  I was sad  
because she was suffering.

At school, a couple of years ago, a so-called acquaintance told lies  
about me to a teacher I was told about it by friends who overheard  
the conversation.

One evening I was watching the news on TV. Again they were  
talking about the danger of war. Suddenly I imagined what it  
might mean for me, for my friends, for the people close to me. I  
felt it a very near and possible event.

I was to take a test and I had not made the necessary preparations  
until it was too late.  There were two days to go and I still had  
not done much.
After a big fight with my parents.
When my grandmother died.

I wrote a letter to my boyfriend but he couldn't answer it in  
time so as a defence mechanism I just found that I felt so sad  
about it and couldn't talk to anyone.
At age 10 my foster grandmother died, I had a fear of dying.
Insulted by some stupid people.

My father has a chronic desease. In the autumn of 1983 he had a  
very strong fit or seizure.
When my dog died.

When I am with friends and I do what pleases me this often  
happenes.
Listening to horrot stories at night.
When my girlfriend of two years told me it was all over.

I was driving and stopped at a stop light. I was planning to make  
a right turn as soon as it was clear. It was clear on the left so  
I started but a man was just in front of the car.

I was at a friend's place for lunch and she fell ill and  
vomited.
When I was told that my uncle had passed away.
The discovery that one has only thought of oneself.

I hate the behaviour of my so called friends, they use bad  
language, spit, boast and treat the youngsters badly.

I had this feeling when I met a girl, not that she was dirty but  
she was to "fresh", dump and childish.

[ I feel disgusted at people who talk negatively about a person  
without knowing the person well.]

A young girl tried to put an end to her life because of lover's  
grief; not until she was in hospital I heard that I had been the  
reason for her action.
My father dying.

When I was studying in the library - preparing for a test, two  
people sitting next to me talked to each other for 20 minutes.   
There were no other seats so I could not go elsewhere and I did    
not want to interrupt them, so I could only be angry in my heart.

When I do not put in the needed amount of hours of work or study  
for the day, I feel guilty and try to make up for the lost  
time.

I failed to keep a promise and this had a serious effet on someone's  
problem.

Not being able to spend more time with a friend who was visiting  
me.
The day when my son said for the first time "mummy".

In a playground I was playing at the seesaw with a little niece.  
I wanted to stop but nobody came to help me. When I got off, all  
alone the seesaw fell down with a big smash. My niece got hurt  
above her eye. Now there is a scar.
When I was admitted to the Higher Institute.

My boyfriend is a soldier. He was on a leave. I felt sad when we  
had to get separated again.

I felt guilty last year during the winter term exams. A colleague  
of mine asked me to give him my lecture notes (I had very good  
notes and I had passed my exam in advance) but I still don't know  
why I didn't give them to him. That colleague failed and he was  
on the verge of not passing it at the supplementary examinations.

A few days back, I walked on a heap of faeces while walking on  
the road.  I got goose flesh because of this.

When a person saw that I was accused of something I had not done  
and did not do anything to defend me.

There was a conflict of interest between me and a close friend of  
mine.  He only thought about his own interest and not about our  
friendship.  This behaviour hurt his friends.  Another incident  
is when a friend isolated himself without giving any reasons.
When my grandmother died of cancer.
After my car accident, when I woke up in a heap of stones.

When I was leaving home I decided to leave without saying  
good-bye to my young brother.  My brother saw me and said,         
" Will you not say good-bye to me?"  He is only 31/2 years old.

On the way back from Denmark with a friend on a small yatch,  
there was a storm and my friend was blown overboard;  I was very  
scared till I managed to get him back onboard.

A class-mate died after being two months in coma, after a car  
accident.

Guilt at having pressed another person to expose/explore his  
personal weaknesses/faults, to the extent that the other person  
was made to feel terrible/defensive.
When I learnt that I had been accepted at UNZA.

I was going home by car late one night when it was cold, dark and  
windy.  I became rather panicky on the way to my house.

I partly colored my hair black. My mother didn't like it and  
reproached me to be a "subversive element". Later on she stated  
that this was due to my friends. As I see it, this all resulted  
from colouring my hair.
I can't remember ever feeling shame.
When I am walking on the streets and see a gang of thugs.
When someone lies to me.
Did not do what I promised to do for a friend.

I felt it when a girl who was dear to me lied to my face. I got  
angry with the fact that she knew I didn't believe her but she  
kept on telling lies.
A party with friends on New Year's Eve.

I was disgusted at the way the bus conductor threw out an old  
woman oiut of the mini-bus simply because she could not pay the  
fare for her luggage.

Two-timing - going out with person other than guy I was in  
relationship with.
Each time the professor asks me a question in class.
When my grandmother died.
When I had my first boyfriend.

I did not go to help a friend of mine, though she probably needed  
me.
Article published in the college newspaper.

It was when my friend had stolen my money (K10) and had  
disappeared.

When we were on holidays my girl-friend had to leave me after 4  
weeks and I had to stay in Turkey for some more weeks because I  
had a job there.

Two boys whom I know were telling me, in an indecent manner, how  
they had teased a young and shy girl I know.  They had despised  
her conviction, scorned and touched her.  I got very angry and  
did not try to conceal it and gave it back to them.

Yesterday when I received a B on a history midterm. I felt  
overjoyed after having received C's previously.
I do not recall being scared in the near past.

On the road there was a dead animal with its entrails showing and  
its skull crushed.

When I realized that I could not communicate properly with my  
closest friend.
Wrongly accused a classmate.

When I got associated with a boy one year ago, I neglected my  
best friend. When the relation with this boy finished she behaved  
very easy-going towards me. I felt guilty then.
First time in anatomy.

I was scared when I realized that I might miss the train which I  
was supposed to take.  I was 1500 Kilometres away from home and when   
I heard the depart whistle I was still 150 feet away from the  
train.  I finally made it.

When my relationship with my family is very poor I often fear  
being excluded from the group, a fear which is stronger in  
situations when an argument is on hand.

At our Senior dinner - separated from school friends, nothing  
will ever be the same again.
I felt fear when I was young and left in my big house all alone.
When I won a trip to Greece in a competition.

Guilty when I hadn't walked my dog for quite a few days and had  
given her no attention.

I felt guilty when I mislead a person into thinking he was a  
close friend when that person was more of a casual acquaintance.

When I was face to face with my deceived friend after sleeping  
with his wife.
When my father had a serious fight with my sister, because of me.
I felt very sad when I heard that a friend had committed suicide.

My parents attitude towards each other when they should become  
reconciled, despite my father's long-time addiction.
When I hurt a person's feelings.

In a fight with my girlfriend in a luncheonette where everybody  
stared at me in such a way that I had to leave it.

When my uncle comes (3 times a year) for the traditional  
Christmas dinner with my grandparents and other relatives and is  
very drunk.

My boyfriend and I did not have any contact with each other during   
the Summer holidays.  I met him the day of the registration and looked   
through him.  In the canteen he asked me if I wanted to have a drink and   
I said no as I did not want him to do me a favour.

At a restaurant I observed how the gypsies tried to get money by  
cheating the foreigners i.e non Swedish speaking.  My anger had  
nothing to do with hatred against foreigners, but it was an  
expression of the anger I feel when I see people being used .

I received a grade above average on a midterm (chemistry) and I  
expected onevery below average.

When I red a report in the magazine VESA about an Iranian telling  
what she had lived in the prisons in Iran. I felt disgust about  
that people.
When I failed grade 7.

I passed an exam which I was not sure at all to pass.  I rejoyced  
at the result because the possibility of continuing my studies  
depended on it.

My brother accused me undeservedly before my parents. I was not  
guilty. He was misled by his wife.

For not having succeded in getting the job as a translator that I  
wanted.
When I was selected to study here at UNZA.
Leaving high school.
Watching Muldoon act as my P.M.
When someone in my family died.

When a pet died. The pet was the closest friend I had for 15  
years.

I received the message that I'd been accepted at the school where I  
really wanted to go.

A child, 9 years old, died in a stupid way.  He fell from a place  
which was 1 metre high.

The serving lady in the students' dining hall shouting at  
studennts.

My daughter was 2 yrs she went up to a colt tried to hit it. It  
turned on her and kicked her over the heart, sent her flying  
through the air. I left my mother and sister to deal to her as  
they are nurses. I felt I didn't want to know if she was going to  
die, it was just too much.

When I stood first in the B.A exams.  Earlier I had heard of  
these boys and girls who were toppers, but when I first heard of  
me having topped I could not believe it.

Several good friends made me a surprise visit and this made me  
happy.  They are my closest friends and we had not seen each  
other for a long time.

Eating too much I felt guilty afterwards because I knew I  
shouldn't have overeaten as I'm putting on too much weight.

I misunderstood a girl and thought that she loved me.  One day  
when I was talking to her, her boyfriend appeared and I felt  
ashamed.

Two summers ago my best friend and I drove into unknown mountains  
at midnight to pick up my broken car. We told one another  
horrifically scary ghost/murder stories and succeeded in scaring  
eachother pretty well - even though somewhere in our heads we  
knew the fears were unjustified.

When I was 7-8 years old, I woke up one night and found myself  
alone at home.  My mother had gone out to buy cigarattes from a  
machine.
Receiving personal criticisms early in the morning.

I have experienced disgust with some people - usually double  
dealers.

Fear from the unknown. I felt fear when I sat for the entrance  
examinations.

I was in the living room at home with an ex-boyfriend, it was  
nearly a year that we had separated, during the talk he began to  
remember our courting and gave me a long kiss.

When my mother was tremendous on the phone and we talked for  
hours. She was in a good mood.

I was 4-5 years old when I hid the bicycle keys of a not very  
good friend.  After a few hours I pretended that I had found  
it.
Our boarder burping after meals !

When a close relative got quite drunk. It was a relative that I  
had respected for a long time and looked up to as a child.
A person died (not really a friend).
Being rude to someone I do not like.

When I think about the short time that we live and relate it to  
the periods of my life when I think that I did not use this  
short time.
When I couldn't find my dog which was missing.

When my father found me in bed with a girl, we were deep in actioon  
when he entered the room.

I was asked to stop studying economics, a field which interested  
me, by my employers.

When my father told me that I should help my mother more often,  
because she was so busy. And I realized that he was right.

My parents do not like my friend and told me to stay away from  
him.

I was living with my brother and one day he went away on business  
and I was left alone to look after the house and the property. At  
night thieves came and wanted to break into the house.

I felt very happy when I heard I had passed the examination to  
move up to the second year course.
When I missed my train this morning, I felt sad for some time.

I got lost in a foreign town. I did not know the language of that  
country and it took me hours to meet my friends again.

I was working in a classmate's house with a group. A girl began  
to graze her foot against mine under the table.
Pictures of Nazi extermination camps on a T.V program.
Railway station good-bye.

When someone threw a firecracker into my room at 7:00 am in the  
morning.

Some students whose English is worse than mine can go to your  
lectures (English lectures).

I went to the cinema with my friends, without telling my mother  
about it as I had been to the cinema the day before also.  When  
she asked me where I had been, I lied.

It was about midnight and I wanted to go to the countryside (I  
was in town) to watch the stars in the sky.  My mother did not  
like this, in spite of it I went out for a while.  My mother got  
angry.

When I got home I found that the electrical supply had been  
disconnected despite my having paid ZESCO the full bill a few   
days earlier.

That was soon after the results of the interview which nearly  
9,000 people attended in all the three regions of Malawi. My joy  
came after hearing on the radio that I was one of the people  
selected to undergo the Medical Assistant training at the  
L.S.H.S.

When I passsed the M.S.C board exams with first class, which I  
had not expected.

I had made an appointment with three friends. We had to go out  
together. When I arrived at the place, the other persons weren't  
there. I became very angry because I thought they were gone  
without me. That, however, didn't appear to be the case.

When I heard about the death of somebody I liked very much and I  
was not present either to see the person or to try to share my  
emotions with other friends.

When I was a child, I was always afraid of my father. Just when  
he looked at me, I felt frightened.

When I have suffered a terrible fit of eating, that frequently  
occurs. Then I eat everything, I act like a glutton I eat big  
amounts of food, sometimes even half a loaf.

When I was in the puberty I smashed the favourite toy of my  
little brother because of a fit of rage.
I was raped by a friend.
Saw a selfish person doing a selfish thing.
Finding my glasses again after having lost them in town.

A close friend of mine was to get married in a weeks time when  
her father died of a heart-attack.  I knew him well and felt bad  
on hearing of his death.

On a boat trip to Denmark, 14 of us had a lot of fun and we  
spent SEK 10 each on one armed bandits and against all odds we  
won the jackpot of SEK 1000.

My patient died of Anaemia while I was organising blood  
transfusion for him, so I felt guilty, because I thought that may  
be I was slow.

On a sailing boat at night, under a full moon, listening to Pink  
Floyd, drinking good wine, with good company, the boat being  
steered by autopilot, and a full eclipse of the moon.

When I came for the lesson, it was cancelled and I had to fill in  
a questionnaire instead.
Being insulted in public.

I was ashamed at being the only one to have got a C+ in ED120  
assignment.

When my mother looked in my drawer (where I keep my personal  
things) and she found some porno photos that I have kept from  
more than a week, and split it.
I kicked the chair in the classroom to express my anger.

I preached to a F.3 students in a gospel camp.  They thus knew  
more about God and made up their minds to believe in Jesus.

When I passed my Primary school leaving certificate and selected  
to go to a Boarding secondary school.

I had a misunderstanding with my father and after some time I  
found that I had been wrong.

I read about a murderer who brutalized his victims by cutting  
open their stomaches and taking out their bowels.
Saw a dirty street.
On the scenic railway at the fairground.

Six months ago when I got acquaintanced with a person whom I  
trusted infinitely and from whom I expected help and friendly  
feelings. With him I found much in common - in our views and in  
our fate.

My sister lost one of her twin sons (my first nephews) and then  
the older one died a week later.

When I had stayed abroad for a long time and I had remembered  
about my friends and relatives. I felt sad and I wanted to see  
them as soon as possible.

In a school parting we agreed to go to a restaurant.  
We met at school and we separated us in several cars. My car  
broke and we arrived late. All those who already had arrived  
stand up and applauded us when we entered two hours late.  
All the restaurant attention was turned on us.
I haven't often felt this feeling. Once someone stole my garment.

My grades. When my parents say, "How are you doing at school,  
getting good grades ?" I say, "Great, just fine !" Actually, I  
feel ashamed about myself.

When I was in form 3, my aunts lied to my daddy telling him that  
I had told them that I was pregnant.  My daddy  told my mother  
and she asked me if it was true.  I was very angry with my aunts.

When I got into a bus I found that my wallet had been stolen.  
It was not a great loss from the monetary point of view but I  
lost some documents - identity papers.  As a result I had to  
spend several days in order to get a new one.  I will always  
remember all the work I had to do and the bad treatment I  
suffered because of the bureaucratic behaviour of the civil  
servant.  I had already had bad luck and they treated me like a  
criminal.   At one point of time I really wanted to quarrel with  
them.
Before going to the dentist.
I stroke a person undeservedly.
When I was six years old, my favourite cat died.
The high school entrance exam.

When I am travelling by car and have to meet an oncoming car  
while overtaking.
A sudden end to the relationship with my first girlfriend.

When I was accepted as a student of Psychology here at  
Gutttenburg.

When I was walking on the street, I slipped on the dung of a dog.  
I did not fall down, but I felt disgusted by the bad smell on my  
sole.

Our association had Polish visitors and when they were going back  
by boat I did not go to see them off (I am the chairman of the  
association).

I felt angry when I saw on T.V the last slaughter of negroes in  
South Africa.
Passing by a good friend's home without coming in to visit him.
Being looked at by someone I do not like.

Many years ago a friend wanted me to with her to southern Europe  
and I preferred to travel alone.  I felt guilty because I wanted  
to go on my own.
Lying to a friend about something that was trivial.
Sadness, no, I felt something much stronger when my father died.

When I saw a documentary film about World War II (about Hitler  
and his adepts).

I felt the above condition when I took my brother's bicycle to a  
market and unfortunately the bicycle was stolen and I didn't know  
how I could tell the owner about the stolen bicycle.

Winning a race that I had been training for, for many weeks.  
(Running Race).
With self at losing an important game that I should have won.

When I was in my village one of my enemies had written a  
non-sense letter to a girl and he told the father of this girl  
that I was the culprit.  When I got to know this I was scared as   
the girl's father was a worse man.

I was in a camp and went out for a walk at night on my own.  I lost   
my way and spent several hours looking for the camp.

When I found out that the girl, with whom I was in love, loved me  
too.
When they threatened me with a knife to take my money.
The lift of Stockholm central station stank of vomit and urine.

I made a long-distance call to people rather close to me and I  
thought about the sad incident that had happened to them in the  
near past; I knew that they were thinking about it too when I made  
the call.
Someone frightened me in the dark.

Receiving notification that I had made a successful application  
to the Speech Therapy course at Uni, gave me a very good feelig  
of achievment and joy.
My behaviour at a recent party.  I passed out early, luckily.
I saw in the street a man spitting.
Fear of sexual overtures from a close relative in the family.

I had promised to contact a friend about a particular matter by a  
certain date, then thought no more about it until the friend  
reminded me after the date had passed.
Getting into this university to do medicine.

When I saw an accident, a woman was run over and she died on the  
spot.

When I asked a friend to return the money that I had loaned her  
and then remembered that she had repayed me in several ways.

During a discussion I said something rather stupid and  
unnecessary.

In May 18th, 1984 my boyfriend went to the U.S.A. In December I  
was told he passed away. He had cancer of the Oesophagus.

I was rushing home from school because there was a 49er game that  
night. I got into a non-injury accident, which was all my fault,  
but destroyed the front of my car. The truck I hit was undamaged.
When a little brother of mine damaged a cassette.

The patient whom I expected to get well suddenly passed away  
after he showed had his meals.
Over an argument.

When my ex-husband left our house, and the children cried because  
he was not coming back.

I am troubled by hair growing in my neck. I was troubled by this  
for a long time and was much ashamed when someone brought his/her  
hands close to my face.

I wanted my boyfriend to stay when he didn't. He stayed but when  
he left I felt ashamed because I should have let him leave when  
he wanted. I was too selfish.

I got my driving licence after they had frightened me with it's  
difficulty.
Given duty by the leaders which I do not like to do.

Unofficially I was informed about my results of the final  
examination of the secondary school. A teacher wrote them up for  
me. When I went outside, I started crying with joy.

That I didn't want my friend to leave on holiday for 10 days  
because I thought I would miss him. I was constantly trying to  
persuade him.
A close married friend has just had his first child.

For a few days I felt very miserable, distressed and listless,  
with crying fits. When this was over I felt very happy, although  
there was no special reason.

I was caught doing something bad and I bribed the person who  
caught me.  Later I felt very bad, maybe I should have paid for  
my bad behaviour.
When my mother caught me masturbating.

I suddenly found that those whom I considerered to be my good  
friends did not care for me.  Although I could still be with them  
I felt unimportant.  I deeply thought about the reason behind  
this so as to see who was responsible for this.  Finally I made  
up my mind and decided not to expect too much from them.  I was  
sad when I decided that they were no longer my good friends.

When my boyfriend was leaving to go home one night, I had a very  
deep sense of uneasiness and an unwarranted fear that I wouldn't  
see him again.

I fell on the ground while crossing the street.  My cap covered  
my eyes and I felt quite "difficult".

When my relatives troubled me so that I would help them  
financially.

One day I was near home, kissing my boyfriend in a car when my  
mother appeared and asked me to go home, because she didn't know  
about the event.

My father was very angry with me, and I locked me up in the  
shower. Then my father knocked his fist through the door, I was  
scared to death.

Many years back I quarrelled with my younger brother for a small  
reason.  I used a pole to beat him and nearly broke his arm.  He  
recovered after a treatment which lasted several months.  After  
this our relationship was worse and he would not listen to me.
My partner left me after we had been together for a long time.

During my holiday I met again a friend who had tried to commit  
suicide. She had just left hospital, her lips were trembling, she  
looked miserable.

When I attended school, our class visited an institution for  
mentally and physically handicapped persons. Although I tried to  
control my feelings, I was disgusted.
When my friend let my personal matters be publicaly known.

When my best friend started getting involved in my private  
affairs.

I was watching T.V with my parents and some pornographic scenes  
came on, I felt uncomfortable and tried to distract my parents  
attention by talking to them.

Last semester when I dated a girl whom I've known for almost a  
year. However one night she said she wanted us to be "just  
friends". I confided this to a friend Jim I was really suffering.  
A month or two later he broke up with his old girlfriend and they  
started going out regularly. I have no girlfriend nor have I had  
a romantic relationship of any significance. I feel some anger  
but we are friends again.

Some time ago I promised to meet an acquaintance of mine and to  
carry him some promised papers. I haven't done it until this day.  
Now I feel quite awkward when I meet him.

I was driving very fast on a small road and I met an oncoming car  
in a right handed bend.  The other driver was on his own side of  
the road and I had to skid out of it to avoid a collision.  It  
was dark.

When I had to go through lonely streets in the middle of the  
night.
In a party of friends I got completely drunk.

When we were going to Nkhoma last Saturday the vehicle was moving  
very fast, so I feared we might crash since the road was too  
rough.
When I come home late at night.

At a carneval-party I smooched with a man - some days later I was  
rather ashamed for that.
I felt joy when my two twin sisters were born.
Unable to help my mother to cook.

I felt guilty when I skipped a two hour practical class I knew I  
would miss out on more information which I did not know, but I  
couldn't cope with going.
Had an argument with my classmate for borrowed books.

When I finally got a job after days of wondering whether I would  
be hired or not and counting on the money that it would bring.

A few years back I had proposed love to a girl who later turned out  
to be related to me.  Though we were in love with each other, we  
both felt ashamed and withdrew from each other.

When I heard my name being announced on the radio that I had been  
successful in an interview for admittance for a medical Assistant  
training course. I was really happy and I enjoyed myself by  
dancing to music from the Radio cassette.

Every time I was around this one person I would stick my foot in  
my mouth by being nasty. One time I accidently said something  
fairly cruel that was totally inappropriate.
Ever since I have been a child, the sight of any kind of wound.

One night my father suddenly suffered from a heart attack which  
lead to breathing difficulties.

My 21st birthday celebration, when I cut the cake and received  
the presents.

When my friends left without waiting for me, after we had arranged  
to go out together.

[ It irritates me when people talk about me behind my back.  I     
prefer people to tell me what they have to, on my face instead  
of talking behind my back.]
When I was sitting in a car next to a man who was masturbating.

One day I was really angry when all my food was eaten by a dog.  
My anger was against my mother because she was careless. She  
didn't keep the food in a hidden and proper place.
I unexpectedly got a present from my father.

When I started a relation with a girl, with whom I have fallen in  
love already some time ago.
Obscene phone calls.

When I was driving my car, I wanted to pick something from the  
floor of the car and drove into the guide-rail. I thought that I  
should not have done that and felt guilty.

My boyfriend told me that I had very high demands towards him. In  
my opinion this was wrong.

When my brother promised me money but he failed to fulfill the  
promise.

I felt much anger and perhaps I feel it till now, against my  
girlfriend's sister who incited her to betray me just when I  
needed her very much. She didn't think of anything, simply  
passed over everything.

Being alone in Europe and having to catch a train and bus to the  
airport, then board the plane alone.

I was a prefect at secondary school.  On the sports day I told  
others that I would take down the names of the people who  
misbehaved and after some time I sat down for a brief rest.   
Suddenly the head prefect came and scolded me in front of others.  
 I was very angry as there were other prefects sitting and he  
picked on me.  I thought that a brief rest was not  serious  
enough to be blamed.

When I was at S.Y.Bajaj I wanted to get admission in another  
college and this was not easy and I felt angry.
A friend who was 22 years old died.
Left alone in the biology building surrounded by empty buildings.

I had received bad news informing me that grandmother and  
grandfather had passed away. The first one to die was my  
grandmother and after two days grandfather died too.

I was selected to do a rest for a foreign ballet but I did not  
have the money to do it.

When someone pointed out that I was proud, yet I didn't dress up  
properly. This was when I and my friend went for a dnce one  
Saturday.

I was walking quite quickly and unthinking through a children's  
playground, when a toddler ran in front of me I knocked him over  
and he hit his head quite hard and began crying.
Finding out about people can go mad for social reasons.

I felt very angry when a mishanga seller robbed me of the  
transport money I had to go to school.
Being in love for the first time.

I was going to my village, after having been rather oppressed in  
Madrid.
I experienced this emotion when my grandfather passed away.
Being alone at night.

When I heard about the treatment of a friend in jail. Really  
inhuman. I never realised that such things also happen in the  
Netherlands.

My girlfriend lost her temper without any reason and she did not  
consider or respect my feelings.
To force someone to do something that suits me.

About a month ago the Regional Council refused to pay my wife the  
due maternity benefit, because of bureaucratic reasons.

I wanted to get in contact with a girl I loved, but I was afraid  
she would refuse me.

When I watched the T.V programme called "The living planet" and  
saw the far reaching environmental destruction caused by man.

After I had given the wrong answer to my students they pointed  
it out to me and I had to correct myself.
My sister gave birth to twins, healthy ones.
I am not good enough for your experiment I am doing.

When a friend carelessly broke and object in my parent's house  
and did not apologize, or pay, or anything.
A recurrent lovesickness.
I forgot to zip up my trousers, this was not noticed by anyone.

I was at a boarding school during my primary school days. I was  
broken so I pretended I was very sick. My father came and he  
picked me up. He spent a lot of money on medical expenses which  
all proved to be negative.

I went shopping with my mother and sister (17 years old). Mother  
always told my sister what she should buy. Instead of assisting  
my sister in defending herself against mother's interference, I  
just behaved aggressively towards my sister.

I was ashamed when I was being introduced to the church  
congregation.

During labour when the foetal sounds became faint and there was a  
big alert for a forceps delivery.

When I read the diary of the girl with whom I was living, it was  
about another boy with whom she had been going around some time back.

I went to the prayer meeting at night and unfortunately the car  
broke down, so my other sister said I had to walk alone from  
Ndirande to Chirimba at around midnight. So we reached home at  
1 am. I was afraid of robbers and dardness.

A friend prepared a soup with chicken heads and invited me to eat  
it. I saw the eyes staring at me and the tongues hanging out of  
the bills. I was so disgusted that I felt nausea and had to leave  
the room.
When I was getting so fat.
It happens to me quite often. I can't describe a particular case.

When I am not able to fulfill any request of my son - can't take  
him out to ride his byke, because I am tired.
When my boyfriend went away for a month long holiday without me.

An uncle of mine who just retired, having worked hard all his  
life, got a cerebral hemorrhage.
Before the examn.
Yelled at my parents for not buying me a car like other parents.
When I see pornographic films.

When I lose on my bets on anything - baseball, football,  
basketball, track, craps, poker, or arcade - whether its 5  
dollars or 200 I feel that I should never have done it in the  
first place.

While cycling in the country a dog started running beside me,  
growling and barking, and trying to bite my foot.

My boy-friend had promised me to come home at about 10 p.m. He  
did not return until midnight and had consumed a lot of alcohol.

When I was young I saw a horror film.  Then when I went to sleep,  
the film came back too my mind and the characters frighteneed my  
imagination.

A friend told me about his cousin who is my girlfriend. He said  
she had treated him in a mean and nasty way. I was surprised  
because in front of other people she had always treated him in a  
friendly way. I am very sad about it.

When I went to the sauna for the first time and there were men  
and women.

Close friend leave to go overseas for an indefinite period.  
Farewell scene at airport.

At a choral concert I appeared as a solist. The concert5 was very  
good, I forgot all the hard work that had been done before. There  
remained only an undescribable joy and a feeling of warmth,  
security etc.
Helping older people on the toilet.
When my colleague spat on my face after a quarrel.

An invitation to spend 5 days at the seaside with all expenses  
paid.
When I lied to the physiology teacher.
When I met friends I had not seen for the last 2-4 years.
The sight of a man who ran amok (fighting) at a dance.

I was with my family and we found some abandoned puppies.  I  
wanted to help them but everyone said no.  We then left.

With the N.Z. Rugby Union wanting to send the All Blacks to South  
Africa.
I asked a girl out on a date and she said no.
I made my boyfriend so unhappy and depressed that I feel guilty.

I have a two-month old baby.  When I came here, to the  
university, to attend lectures, I had to leave the baby with his  
father.  I felt guilty.
When I had to eat scraps from a dust-bin, because of a bet.
I may not be clever enough to understand your English lectures.

Once I had dinner at an elegant restaurant and I did not have  
enough money to pay the bill. There were a lot of people there  
and I felt quite awkward.

I am disgusted by people who spoil their identity because of  
misbehaviour.  This morning when I was in a crowded bus, I found  
a seat on which a university student was sitting on one side and  
he had put his bag and files next to him.  There was very little  
space left and I sat down while he kept on reading.  Even when I  
leaned on him he did not put his bag away.  He did not respond and  
I felt very angry.

When I opened my TE Score envelope, and saw I got into  
Physiotherapy.

I had been having a heated argument with a lover - whose  
intention was that we should marry in the near future - and was  
rejected by her when I started to cry. When I stopped crying for  
a moment she said "There, have you got it all out now ?".

I was living at home during the Summer vacations and towards the  
end decided to take some of my clothes and other belongings to  
the appartment in Guttenburg.  When I had finished I went to my  
ex-boyfriend's (relationship uncertain) home and stayed there  
till 5 A.M.  I had to leave then as my parents needed the car for  
work in the morning.  My parents do not like my boyfriend.

My boyfriend finished our relationship when I started studying  
psychology in Nijegen, because then we would not be able to meet  
frequently anymore.

When I was late for work and told my boss that it was due to  
transport problem, whereas the truth was that I had woken up  
late.  I thus cheated my boss.

Being away from a very close friend, I was away from Finland  
for a year as an exchange student.

When I failed one of the tests because I had not worked hard  
enough.

My classmate used her personal relations to get a seat for a  
subject that I wanted also.  I had taken the pains to help him  
apply and I did not get selected.  I did not like this as he had  
not told me the facts earlier, he need not have lied to me.

After a footballmatch I went home by car, a friend drove. I did  
not realize that he was drunk until we were in the car. He was  
madly racing. Several times we were in dangerous situations and I  
told him to be cautious, but he did not care.

On a telephone talk where I was agressive and stupid without the  
least, reason or better motive.

A few days back my mother was not feeling too well and still did  
all the house work.  I felt guilty as I had not offered to help.

I got angry with a stranger in a train who behaved impertinently  
and immorally

I had been in love with a certain young man who pretended to love  
me but one day I found out that he had another girlfriend who was  
also a friend of mine.

I am thinking about death, the eternal of it, the unknown, the  
sense of being here. Often, laying in bed in the dark and quiet,  
the fear makes me feel dizzy.
Once my father slapped my mother for a small quarrel.

The fact that I hadn't been informed about something and I had the  
greatest trust in this person.
When some friends betrayed my friendship.
Going to Chico to visit a friend.

I was very much ashamed after a friend beat me at school and I  
was defeated.

This happened when one of my uncles died just whan I was  
planning to go and visit him during the next holidays.
I felt shame when I found that I was almost last in the exam.

When one meets new people with whom one is forced to collaborate  
with.

Several days after my final examination at school, I was sitting  
in an airplane on my way to Greece. I enjoyed that moment very  
much.

While walking through an old mining area, I unwittingly disturbed  
a wallaby which, in its resultant flight, accidentally fell down  
a deep mine shaft. On investigation it seemed uninjured, but it  
was impossible for the wallaby to get out, and also for me to get  
it out of the shaft. To prevent its suffering a slow death, I  
shot it.

When I think that I do not study enough.  After the weekend I  
think that I should have been able to have accomplished  
something during that time.
At an unjust insult or injure.

I felt shame when I didn't study enough for my exams and as a  
result I failed. I then invented idle stories to talk it good for  
myself and the others.

I wanted to borrow lecture notes from a friend and he did not  
lend me them.

Several years ago my mother died. She had been ill for a long  
time, but nevertheless her death came unexpectedly. I did not and  
I still do not want to believe that it is true.

When a friend, after being free of drugs for half a year, started  
using them again.

Getting sent on a company expense trip to another state to work  
for a week at that plan.
Not handing in homework in time.

When my boyfriend and I experience something nice or when we have  
made a nice walk together.

I was indignant at the unimpartiality shown by the referees at  
the football match between Bulgaria and France.

When I realised that I had become too emotionally involved with  
the person I'm going out with, and when I began to like someone  
else and questioned whether I really care about person I'm with.

During a movie in which I saw the effect of white settlers in  
Africa.

This also happened when I was very small.  I was beaten up by my   
mother for no fault of mine, I had just beaten up my younger  
brother for what I thought was his fault.  I was very angry with  
my mother.

When I received the result slip of the higher level examination  
(an university entrance exam) and saw that I had a very good  
possibility of being accepted into the university, I felt very  
excited.

I was very angry with a girlfriend for interferring a little too  
much with my personal affairs. I told her so rather strongly and  
she started crying.
When I was put into a tennis team below my standard.
When I tripped while getting on a bus.
My anger is with men, their inability to be human (not all men).

When I committed a sin mentioned in ANGER. A sin of sexual  
immorality.
Not being able to have a party at home with friends.

When I was dreaming that I was being chased, in the upmost of  
horror the door of the closed felt down synchronicaly with the  
dream scare.
When having a relationship, I made love with another girl.
Walking alone in the dark in a strange street.
Success in university entrance examination.

A month ago when one of my fellow workers got a promotion over  
me. It was just a small promotion but recognition was involved.

During the Christmas holidays, I went to see my parents and  
stayed with them for two weeks. After two or three days, we had  
the same conflicts we had had ten years before when I had lived  
with them. They were glad when I left.

When I heard about the death of Frantois Truffaut, the French motion   
picture director, on the radio.  I had planned to go and see his  
last film.

It was a narrow and dirty passage which was located near the  
market and I had to stand there to wait for people.

When my dog died.  I had reared it for nearly three years.  It  
had been ill for several days and had not eaten anything.  One  
morning I found it dead.

When I almost drowned myself in the municipal swimming pool that  
I use to go almost not excaping.

I was very happy when my scholarship to continue studying at UNZA  
was approved after it had been cancelled.

When I stole money from my mother and she asked me later if I was  
responsible.  I never admitted it.

When a friend didn't invite her own parents to her Graduation  
ceremony.
A parking fine.
When I was admitted to the Bulgarian State Conservatoire.

I was alone at home and I could hear odd noises coming from above  
our bedroom.  I knew that nobody lived there since it was an  
office.  I got frightened (later I was given a "natural"  
explanation).

When an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to  
talk about old memories. I hadn't seen him for 8 years.
A close person lied to me.
I did bad on a test I didn't study for.

At my grandfather's funeral - My grandparents virtually raised me  
as my mother was a solo-parent and had to work.

A day I was with my boyfriend and a couple of friends in a bar,  
and he said something that I didn't like (I don't remember what).  
Without thinking I slept him in his back, getting ashamed and  
sorry just after.

I was once this week angry when soemone trying to compress my  
mind due to his nonsense speech which himself could not tolerate  
at all.

I was ashamed one day when we were found stealing and roasting  
maize cobs from Agricultural experimental projects.
When I passed my final examination at school.
I was sad when I saw that a beautiful girl was not attainable.

I was ashamed when I got the lowest result (mark) in class. All  
the same I didn't worry too much because I knew I would have got  
much better if I had read enough.
When I was told that my friend's wife had cancer.

We were walking in the park at night.  It was very dark and very  
late.  We began to hear foot steps all around us, and we could  
not find our way out.

When I was a child I was playing on the upper deck of the bed  
with my brother.  My parents slept on the lower deck.  My father  
felt disgusted and beat me up.  I felt very sad as my father had  
never beaten me or scolded me before.

When a close friend met me at the station in the middle of the  
night, when I came back from a long and tiring journey.

I was accused of having drunk a bottle of liquor and then  
refilling with water.

My class leader told me I am not chosen for your English  
lectures.
I lost my purse that had money in it. I was sad until I found it.
When I failed my Standard 8 Examination for the first time.
Unjust punishment of a friend of mine.

When I slept for the first time all alone in the house where I  
live now. A man phoned me at 2.00 am. He wanted something from

Inter-national sports events won by my favourite national team or  
player brings me joy, e.g when India won the World cup cricket  
match.

When my friend needed my help very much and I, at that moment, made  
an end to our relationship.
When I had my first sexual relation and it didn't work.
When I was told that my father had passed away.

My paternal grandmother had died. We weren't close but she was  
blood. I didn't cry but I was sad, partly due to her death and  
partly I think, due to the fact that I couldn't/didn't cry.

A few days back I had to ask a professor a ridiculous question  
because I had lost at a game of cards and had to pay a forfeit.

My teacher asked me a question which I failed to answer and I was  
told to stay behind after the class and give the answer after  
studying it from a book.
The dying of a close member of the family.

I always get angry when somebody deceives me, or tries to conceal

My father and I had an argument because I do not help enough at  
home.

Someone didn't show up at a meeting in spite of having agreed to  
come.
When I don't justify the confidence of people that I respect.

A very close friend from Victoria visited me over the holidays.  
Having enjoyed his company immensely over 10 short days, I was  
overwhelmed by sadness when he left to return to Victoria.
Encouter with a prostitute.

I was angry when I had not been granted a leave out pass during  
the last weekend.

After going through a glass door, I sustained a number of serious  
cuts which were gaping open.
Vertigo - standing on a ladder and painting the house.

I experienced joy when I got the results - I had made it to the  
second year.

When I pass exams, or when a close friend of mine recovered

One of these people who sell meat in town used a knife to stab

Argument with roommate over a lock he had put on kitchen cupboard  
without telling anyone.

An unjust refree decision at a sports event when I was the team  
leader.
Speaking in front of a large group of people.

When my friend did not pass the high school graduation  
examinations.
Negative statement concerning me of a friend before strangers.

I felt guilty the other day because I took two pieces of bread  
instead of one in the Cafeteria and some of the girls were short

Gave the wrong meal tickets to other people (my classmate).
Passing an examination, although I felt sure I had failed.

When I went home on holidays I found that my niece and nephew had

before death but suddenly died.
When my studies are too demanding and I cannot cope with it.

I was supposed to have done some things for my mother, but just

Prolonged "niggling" of friend on a single theme which I

I remember that once, a friend did not co-operate with me due to  
some unavoidable reasons.  Unaware of this I treated her unjustly

I live with my boyfriend, we have a close relationship, I fell in  
love with another man.

When I unjustly accused a person of my family of something she  
didn't really do.

While studying chemistry with a friend we became angry with  
eachother because we were both fed up.
Made a statement that other people did not believe.

I had an appointment with a colleague of mine to give her my

Not speaking to my sister-in-law due to lack of interest in a

A man was unfair to a girlfriend of mine.
Losing my temper to my sister.

After studying a lot for my H.S.C exams, I could not make it to

When I made up with a girl-friend of mine after having been on

When my grandfather died, with whom I had a very close  
relationship.

I once felt shame when I failed to fulfil the promise to marry a  
daughter of a certain gentleman.
I failed to complete a working task within the agreed time.

A day when I was getting out of the shower I covered only the  
front part of my body with a towel (I was 7 years old), and I

Thinking about death when walking alone at night.

When my grandmother died. I had a very deep relation to her (I  
lived with her for several years).

[ During my childhood when I could not get what I wanted from my  
brother/sister and parents.]
When I witnessed an accident.
When my father was very drunk and raging at home.

We owned a shop and I used to serve in it occasionally. We  
sometimes took lollies out of the stand and Dad caught me one  
day.

When I arrived too late at a meeting of mentor (the night before  
the introduction of novices on the University start).

When I met my girlfriend again in another town after a long

A Maori language oral test, yeaterday - Although I had studied  
intensely - once in the examiners room "I blew it" -  I was so  
nervous I couldn't reply easily - It was very important, but I  
got only blankness.
My best friend betrayed me and told other people my secrets.

When my cousin passed away unexpectedly and tragically (a  
murder).
Doing well in the examn.
Not doing well in the examn.

I work at a day care centre, and one day when the children were  
outdoors a four-year old boy disappeared from the yard.  I was  
not looking after them then, but as the manager it was me who was  
responsible.

I felt disgust when I realized that I had eaten something fatty,  
and vomited too much.

I was on a farm with a few friends and during the talk I  
discovered that a friend of mine, was being betrayed by her  
boyfriend and a 3rd friend of ours.
A mother who shouts at her child for nothing.

One night a very dear person said: "I hate you". Of course it was  
an impulse and this person didn't feel that about me. The person  
expressed regret, and everything was settled, but I can't forget.
My wrong behaviour made my loved one feel sad and uneasy.
When a friend of mine was beaten for what was my fault.

When my darling found me walking hand in hand with another girl  
whom I loved also.
When a student of mine (at music) performed and played remarkably well.

When the class leader read out the names of those chosen for the

They had returned much less of my taxes than I had expected.

Disgust is a feeling that I have never experienced with peoplie  
but , on the other hand, it has been with repulsive animals, i;e  
snakes on T.V.

When I learnt that my offer to study at the university had been

My father died 4 years ago, 18 months after my mother died. I

When I was insulted by a fellow student.

I lied to someone and some time later this person found out that  
I had not told him the truth.

When I was going home for my holiday, I almost drowned in the

On my birthday, an old friend of mine sent me a card. I had not

When I let my girlfriend use my essay to help her to write hers  
and the tutor found them alike.
When I saw a big man hit another one, and nobody did anything.
My friend had trouble and I was not able to help him.

When I was 12 years old, some friends of our family had come to

When we got a young dog.

In an exam when I answered the questions with very little

I got angry at a friend of mine whom I caught reading my notebook

When I went to see the doctor and had to take my clothes off so

Left alone in the dark in a big building.
Person talking about a situation while eating.

When I saw that the mark I had obtained in an exam was a good

While trying to board a train I missed the footsteps and fell

When I was accused of having impregnated someone's daughter, it

I had told my boyfriend that I did not want to go on with our

When my car froze, and I could not start it.
Reading a nice book and talking about it to my friend.

There was an earthquake for several minutes and I was on the

I am chosen for the English lectures instead of my good friend

When I unexpectedly received birthday greetings from a person I

When my grandfather died.

Getting drunk and creating a lot of trouble at a place I respect

When males in my family try to assign house duties exclusively

My roommate got married and invited me to share a flat with them.  
But with a young couple there should not be a third person. I am

I promised to join a meeting but did not turn up as I did not

Being chased in the dark by someone I did not know.

At school teacher for not allowing us to go out on New Year's Eve

My brother and I were driving to Brisbane when he drove back onto

A woman I know is slowly dying from cancer. Observing this

First time going out with a boy and other people laughed at us.
Girls dressed like foreigners in the university.

Sadness - this is an emotion which I have felt very often

My mother caught me stealing some food when I was a young  
boy.

The doctors from Belogradchik town determined a wrong diagnosis

I was wearing a short skirt one day and someone told me my

I told a lie about someone to someone else and they found out

When I decided not to out any longer with a girl whom I liked

When I woke up one morning and went to the kitchen I discovered

Reading a letter from a close friend who said he missed me and

Once I was stopped by the police in Spain, when I had some

My husband had gone to drive a strange, broken car.  At the

A friend had promised to get me a book which was very important

I had quarelled with a friend of mine and I later realized that

I borrowed a car which was supposed to be used for a long journey

Hear a very nice joke made by a friend.
An inter-college basket-ball match.
When I nearly caused a traffic accident with my car.

My first real experience with a boy. We were alone. I was quite

This happened a year when I was having a hard time, I got

Sitting in a bus, I heard behind, the voice of a girl I was

I lent a text-book to a person I did not know very well, they

It happened that I was alone - with no contacts with friends.
When I saw my brother being attacked and I could not do anything.

A fellow player, quite unexpectedly, scores a goal, which means a

When my girl went away for a holiday without saying good-bye to

I feel disgust with some people when I see what they are capable

When my friend who is close to me got engaged and did not invite

The greatest guilt I felt and I didn't know if it was really

I didn't go, when his situation became worse in the U.I.T. (Unity

Sitting alone in a quiet room, concetrating on things happening

I had a small argument with a relative and some other people got

At the moment when I heard the result of an examination and it

The last time I felt it was when I was coming home late at night.
I was scolded by my mother for no reason.
When I hurt my parents in one way or another.
The price I was charged for work on my car.
A girl I was with went off with another guy.
Saw someone messing up our room.

In the student's union there was someone who took the photocopies

A person close to me mistook my good intentions for bad, and

After one year of searching, my friend and I have found a flat we

Following an argument with my brother, he broke my golf clubs.
While paddling in the river during a storm.  I feared drowning.
Hearing of the death of a friend who had been skiing.
Grovelling people.
When I was caught stealing money from my father.
Not winning a medal in the swimming contest.

When I went to my room-mate's drawer to see if she had an iron

When I caused much pain and sorrow to my boyfriend by finishing

This happens to me when I am not prepared in a given subject.

Receiving understanding from within self of a subject I had

When I was talking to a person who is a hypocrite, I felt

Got ill.

When I have to go in for an exam and the examinor is a person

I sensed this feeling when I passed successfully the second tour

When abroad, while driving a car along a dark, winding road.
I had a very pleasant conversation with one of my friends.
When an earlier friend was spreading negative rumours about me.
I overreacted towards my mother and felt ashamed afterwards.

"Boy, you have been admitted to the medicine school and your

When I was cycling past a parked car someone opened the door and

When I had lied to a friend/son about some things we had

While intoxicated I invaded someone's (a girl's) personal space

At my wedding - standing with the man I love and acknowledging

I felt disgust with alcohol in general when a close friend of

When I heard that I had passed my MCE Exam, I spent the whole

After I had made my debut at Ullevi against IFK, Gottenburg and

Failing in the English language exam.
Being treated unfairly.
When seeing a friend that I had not seen in a long while.

I was travelling in a local train when a drunkard, smelling

When I was locked out of my room by my room-mate's friend.
My boy-friend an I seperated on his initiative.
After my +2, when I did not get admission in B.E I felt disgusted.

As a small boy, I took a coin from an empty taxi cab.  My mother

When I took the car of someone without saying it to him.

During an informal talk with a friend when we talk about the life

I feel it when I see that somebody is traying to made a stupid of

A quarrel was followed by the decision of leaving a person close

When I was misleaded by a person who assured that something would

After intercourse.

I was given a gift by my sister. There were many pleasant things

Afraid of getting alone without friends, without anybody.

When I was with a girl who seemed to love me, while I was with

I was in the dark room, it's insecure and has holes covered with

I was skiing alone and the mountain became covered with mist and

This is one feeling I never betray, but I must confess that the

Not applicable to myself.

We were in the country and I walked away from the others one

I had met someone and we became good friends. Our relationship

During my birthday party a friend drank too much alcohol. So much

Lost my girl-friend.

On the occasion of assignment of tasks and responsibilities in

I was in a bus with my school material when I fell and sat on the

Mad at my dad.

I was a passenger in a vehicle when suddenly another vehicle came

The time I was threatened with expulsion from secondary school (form

Having had a very heated argument with my sister - I began

When I first suffered from syphilis.

When I realized that we are living on borrowed time, and that the

When I caused needless anxiety to a person close to me because of

I went to visit friends and it was very companionable.

I felt a sense of shame when I compromised a colleague of mine. I

A girl dropped some stuff from her bag and when I tried to help

When I cancelled an appointment with an idle story. Afterwards

Fighting with class mates in Highschool.

When I was a child I was afraid of big dogs. One day when I came

After a motor accident (I was the frong-seat-passenger) I spit

A relative died.
Saw my unfair report.

After listening to ghost stories with my classmates I had to back

Doing something wrong at home, and then letting my (normally)

I feel disgusted with toadies, hypocrites, chameleons.
A male, Honduran acquaintance of mine despised my opinions.
Being elected as class leader.

At my grandmother's detestable and selfish conduct towards my

After masturbation.
Meeting an old friend from high school.

When I lied to my mum, who later came to know that what I had

My grandmother died.

When I stayed on a nudism beach, a man was watching me in a

My cut was run over by a car. After searching for a long time I

When I was watching some scenes from the Bertoluchi's film

I had promised to visit my girlfriend but for different reasons

Your prejudice against psychology students and education students

Whenever I see an alcoholic.
Being made to look like a fool by a girl.

After a hard day at the university I also had to make dinner that

When I shirked the gymnastic lesson I met the director of our

First time in anatomy.
Insulted for no reason.
When my friend was punished for something that I had done.

A friend had promised to call me at a certain time. I expected

When I had insulted my father two years back, at that time I was

I watched the news at the TV, it was a commentary about

When I went to the library three weeks after it had opened and

Finding out that my best friend could not go to university.

I was disgusted to discover that my girlfriend of few weeks was

In the classroom we discussed with the teacher. He told me things

When my library books were overdue and I did not have the money

When my son was born.
At work being shifted to another area.
Good dinner on the National Day.

When my last year's second semester results came through - I was

The disgust I feel towards a certain person.
My friend has to go on field trips, he just told me.
I was very happy when I got an attractive Summer job.

When I tried to explain to a plumber, face to face, that the

When I got separated from my first love.

While having a discussion with a colleague of mine, I realized that her

One day I was supposed to go to a movie with my boyfriend. In the

It was when my father beat my mother while she was ill for three

At the tender age of eleven a friend and I left a party and

The begining of my relations with my current girlfriend.

Staying alone in the room after midnight and reading horror  
stories.
When I had beaten my auntie.

When I went out with a friend of mine to meet her ex-boyfriend  
who didn't know that she was engaged to be married.

Death of my grnadfather after having been in hospital for so long

When we decided, my boyfriend and I, that we would separate, I

Got in touch with earlier friends after a long absence.
My friend will find out that I am in love with her.

When I recently got a very positive answer from a clinic telling

An argument that grew out of an ordinary conversation with a

Once I failed seven subjects at school and I was terrified to

When I dated a close girlfriend's boyfriend a few times. He told  
me that it was over between them and I accepted it.  When she

A study visit to a chicken factory : the butchery, the smell,  
the environment and the noise.

It was when I stepped on a python (snake) unknowingly while it  
was sleeping near a baobab tree.

Father said: If you are pregnant, you will have to procure  
abortion. I was filled with disgust against my father.

My younger sister wanted to take classes to learn a musical  
instrument.  One Saturday morning my mother asked me to go with         
her for the registration.  I did not want to go  so I said that  
there might be many bad people at the club.  As a resullt my  
sister was scolded by my mother.

While playing a ball game, I was just about to make a goal when I  
was thrown off my feet, and I failed to score the goal.

When a close friend, residing in the hostel, lost his father I  
really pittied him and the situation made me feel sad.
Finding out that I have misunderstood other people.

Last week, my organization summoned an executive meeting and one  
of the executive member's pointed out a loop hole in the  
committee's administration.  He could not suggest any  
improvements, so I quarrelled with him.

While swimming, I hit my head at the bottom of the pool and  
required stitches. I later learned that the consequences could  
have been much more severe and that terrified me.
When a friend wouldn't speak to me and wouldn't tell me why.
Going out for dinner, or during one ice-cream and four spoons.

I made an appointment with a friend to drink coffee togehter.  
However, for the third time in that week she arrived an hour too  
late.
Finding out that I made a stupid mistake in the examn.

I was angry when my sister began to talk nonsense and to laugh at  
the way I swept the room.  My anger grew (I tried to control  
myself).  After telling her to leave me alone, I vented my anger  
on her as she did not obey me.
When I was left by the person I loved without any reason.

One of my friends went and told another friend of mine that I was  
going abut with another guy in Lilongwe besides the one I had.  
She said I was seen with him hand in hand.

When I visited a creche. The conditions weren't too precarious  
but the children were in conditions of physical and emotional  
penury.
Lying to my grandparents about visiting my boyfriend in Chico.

It was during the beginning of the term. I had K100 and kept it  
in my handbag. I left the handbag in the wardrobe but didn't  
lock it. Next time I found that K30 were stolen.

The fridge we had at home had a lock.  One day when I wanted  
something, I unscrewed the door but unfortunately I was caught in  
the act.

I made friends with a classmate whose behaviour I did not like -  
he tried to flatter other people and did not respect me.

Some colleagues decided to go out on a Saturday not inviting me  
to decide either the place nor the time.
Someone acting stupid in public.

I got a good reaction from my tutor and tutorial group for a  
presentation I'd given that I was very worried about.
Death of my grandmother.

When I was in Bombay one of my good friends was getting married  
and he had not informed me about it, this made me sad.
[ When I am, in my opinion, not understood correctly. ]

I invited two friends. We should go out together. Those two girls  
kept talking about boys, chatting up etc. I bacame sick of it.

Riding through a bush fire on an island of Australia - on a  
pushbike as a little boy - all alone, lost and surrounded by  
smouldering wood and flame.

When my boyfriend and I went out for a dinner and subsequently  
went to his family. We had a very nice evening.
I scolded my sister without waiting for her explanation.

When I began to read a thick book, which I had a limited time to  
read.  Also when I have a lot of work to do and I cannot keep up.

When I forgot the birthday of my best friend and I innocently  
came to visit her one week later.

We had to take our cat to the vet for mercy killing (an  
injection).
When my beloved girlfriend got married to another person.

While playing indoor-hockey, there always is an older man who  
frequently and intentionally plays the ball out of the field. In  
my opinion this is very childish, because we play for fun only.

When I was trying for a girl who I really liked and cared for and  
thought she felt the same way too. But she didn't like the idea  
and just wanted to stay friends.

A few months ago when I was teaching, I suddenly became very  
angry at the children and slapped some of them.

I thought that I was going to fail a subject and so I began to  
study for the final exam, then my friend told me that I had  
passed it.  That meant that I could go home, as I do not study in  
my hometown.

Uncleaniness at my work place.  The place is generally not very  
clean, but when it reaches a point, I get angry at the person  
who is supposed to clean the place and the people who are  
supposed to supervise him.
Death of a parent.
I greeted a friend and he did not respond.

I had a quarrel with a friend who lived with me in the same flat.  
He moved out. Before he went he invited me and some friends for a  
drink. At last he was totally drunk and smelled disgusting.  
Besides, he told lies about us and behaved as if he was to be  
pitied.

On our way to France, my girlfriend and I went to Verona. By  
chance we met an Italian couple - they gave us two tickets for  
the dress-rehearsal of "Aida". It was a different world for us  
full of fascination. After the representation we ate a phantastic  
pizza in a restaurant near the "Arena".

One day my friend told me that she had heard that I was moving  
about with her boyfriend. I was disgusted with the news.
When my love for a guy was returned.

When my grandfather died, I saw my grandmother crying against my  
aunt's shoulder (I had never seen my grandmother cry before).

At a party where the boys were telling revolting stories about  
the girls they'd been with.

Talking to friends about how old you are and we cannot be as  
successful as you at your age.
When I was complimented and called "delightful".

One day I found an incontinent man in the ward. This patient had a  
guardian who couldn't give him a bath. So I just left him like that  
but felt guilty until I went back to give him a bath.
When I arrived late at the job and met the most troublesome boss.

When I became angry at my boyfriend without any reason. I know he  
cannot bear me being angry at him and that he can't study anymore  
then.

My peers didn't want me to meet someone during rush for fear that  
I would give her a bad outlook on our Sororoty house. I shouldn't  
have seen this, but they blew and I did.
Being aggressive against members of my family.

A few months a close relative of mine died.  I had never expected
